mapper.select: SELECT a.awp_ids AS awpIds, a.awp_name AS awpName, a.awp_unit AS awpUnit, a.awp_model AS awpModel, a.awp_fs_ids AS awpFsIds, a.awp_fs_name AS awpFsName, a.awp_remarks AS awpRemarks, a.awp_unit_price AS awpUnitPrice, a.awp_purchase_price AS awpPurchasePrice FROM anbiao_weixiu_peijian a
